item.title: Day two try 1 billion
item.description: so i have been working on wordpress and i decided to upgrade all my friends to wordpress. so i did mike’s, miriams, Dylan’s, danielles and comptons and soon i will get Matiss’s and Thom’s. hopefully this will rule - we could have a huge trackback club. and more people will se our blogs. MORE MORE MORE. then i will have to make blogs.nata2.org fancy. i imagine i will attempt to use javascript and ajax to make it rule.
